name: Buddy System!
description:
Note: This game was made for the Mini Jame Gam #10 with a theme of "Reality is Breaking" and a special object, "Telephone". All assets were created by me, except for the font and the color palette. Links at the bottom.

Buddy System is a puzzle game about monsters who have come from other dimensions to your reality. Call them on your phone so they can help you close the dimensional portals and gather anomalies!

Instructions:

  • "W", "A", "S", "D" or the arrow keys to move
  • Hold "Space" to bring up your phone contacts menu. Use "A" and "D" to swap between buddies to call, and let go to select one. Then use "W", "A", "S", or "D" to put a buddy in a valid tile next to you.
  • Use "R" to reset the level.

Asset Credits:

  • Font: Press Start 2P via Google Fonts
  • Color Palette: Fantasy_ via Lospec

Technologies:

  • Godot 3
  • C#
